verses.verse: דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that הָיָ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹאֵ֖ל <S%H3100><s%> that came to Joel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פְּתוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H6602><s%> of Pethuel

שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> O הַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <S%H2205><s%> this ye old men וְהַֽאֲזִ֔ינוּ <S%H238><s%> and give ear כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> all ye inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land הֶהָ֤יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> happened זֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> in בִּֽימֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H3117><s%> Hath this been in your days וְאִ֖ם <S%H518><s%> or even בִּימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> in the days אֲבֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> your fathers'

עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and לִבְנֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H1121><s%> ye your children סַפֵּ֑רוּ <S%H5608><s%> Tell וּבְנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> of it and [let] your children לִבְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1121><s%> [tell] their children וּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> and their children לְד֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generation אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H312><s%> another

יֶ֤תֶר <S%H3499><s%> hath left הַגָּזָם֙ <S%H1501><s%> That which the palmerworm אָכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> eaten הָֽאַרְבֶּ֔ה <S%H697><s%> hath the locust וְיֶ֥תֶר <S%H3499><s%> hath left הָאַרְבֶּ֖ה <S%H697><s%> and that which the locust אָכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> eaten הַיָּ֑לֶק <S%H3218><s%> hath the cankerworm וְיֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> hath left הַיֶּ֔לֶק <S%H3218><s%> and that which the cankerworm אָכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> eaten הֶחָסִֽיל׃ <S%H2625><s%> hath the caterpiller

הָקִ֤יצוּ <S%H6974><s%> Awake שִׁכּוֹרִים֙ <S%H7910><s%> ye drunkards וּבְכ֔וּ <S%H1058><s%> and weep וְהֵילִ֖לוּ <S%H3213><s%> and howl כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שֹׁ֣תֵי <S%H8354><s%> all ye drinkers יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> account עָסִ֕יס <S%H6071><s%> because of the new wine כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> That נִכְרַ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> for it is cut off מִפִּיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6310><s%> from your mouth

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For גוֹי֙ <S%H1471><s%> For a nation עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> is come up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אַרְצִ֔י <S%H776><s%> upon my land עָצ֖וּם <S%H6099><s%> strong וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and without מִסְפָּ֑ר <S%H4557><s%> and without number שִׁנָּיו֙ <S%H8127><s%> whose teeth שִׁנֵּ֣י <S%H8127><s%> [are] the teeth אַרְיֵ֔ה <S%H738><s%> of a lion וּֽמְתַלְּע֥וֹת <S%H4973><s%> and he hath the cheek teeth לָבִ֖יא <S%H3833><s%> of a great lion לֽוֹ׃

שָׂ֤ם <S%H7760><s%> He hath laid גַּפְנִי֙ <S%H1612><s%> my vine לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <S%H8047><s%> waste וּתְאֵנָתִ֖י <S%H8384><s%> my fig tree לִקְצָפָ֑ה <S%H7111><s%> and barked חָשֹׂ֤ף <S%H2834><s%> he hath made it clean חֲשָׂפָהּ֙ <S%H2834><s%> bare וְהִשְׁלִ֔יךְ <S%H7993><s%> and cast [it] away הִלְבִּ֖ינוּ <S%H3835><s%> thereof are made white שָׂרִיגֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H8299><s%> the branches

אֱלִ֕י <S%H421><s%> Lament כִּבְתוּלָ֥ה <S%H1330><s%> like a virgin חֲגֻֽרַת־ <S%H2296><s%> girded שַׂ֖ק <S%H8242><s%> with sackcloth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> For בַּ֥עַל <S%H1167><s%> for the husband נְעוּרֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5271><s%> of her youth

הָכְרַ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> is cut off מִנְחָ֛ה <S%H4503><s%> The meat offering וָנֶ֖סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> and the drink offering מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אָֽבְלוּ֙ <S%H56><s%> mourn הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests מְשָׁרְתֵ֖י <S%H8334><s%> ministers יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S

שֻׁדַּ֣ד <S%H7703><s%> is wasted שָׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> The field אָבְלָ֖ה <S%H56><s%> mourneth אֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> the land כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for שֻׁדַּ֣ד <S%H7703><s%> is wasted דָּגָ֔ן <S%H1715><s%> for the corn הוֹבִ֥ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> is dried up תִּיר֖וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> the new wine אֻמְלַ֥ל <S%H536><s%> weak יִצְהָֽר׃ <S%H3323><s%> the oil

הֹבִ֣ישׁוּ <S%H954><s%> be ashamed אִכָּרִ֗ים <S%H406><s%> O ye husbandmen הֵילִ֙ילוּ֙ <S%H3213><s%> howl כֹּֽרְמִ֔ים <S%H3755><s%> O ye vinedressers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> For חִטָּ֖ה <S%H2406><s%> for the wheat וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׂעֹרָ֑ה <S%H8184><s%> and for the barley כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because אָבַ֖ד <S%H6><s%> is perished קְצִ֥יר <S%H7105><s%> because the harvest שָׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the field

הַגֶּ֣פֶן <S%H1612><s%> The vine הוֹבִ֔ישָׁה <S%H3001><s%> is dried up וְהַתְּאֵנָ֖ה <S%H8384><s%> and the fig tree אֻמְלָ֑לָה <S%H535><s%> languisheth רִמּ֞וֹן <S%H7416><s%> the pomegranate גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also תָּמָ֣ר <S%H8558><s%> tree the palm tree וְתַפּ֗וּחַ <S%H8598><s%> also and the apple tree כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עֲצֵ֤י <S%H6086><s%> [even] all the trees הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> of the field יָבֵ֔שׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> are withered כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Indeed הֹבִ֥ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> is withered away שָׂשׂ֖וֹן <S%H8342><s%> because joy מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> From בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> from the sons אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men ס

חִגְר֨וּ <S%H2296><s%> Gird וְסִפְד֜וּ <S%H5594><s%> yourselves and lament הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> ye priests הֵילִ֙ילוּ֙ <S%H3213><s%> howl מְשָׁרְתֵ֣י <S%H8334><s%> ye ministers מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar בֹּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> come לִ֣ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> lie all night בַשַּׂקִּ֔ים <S%H8242><s%> in sackcloth מְשָׁרְתֵ֖י <S%H8334><s%> ye ministers אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> of my God כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִמְנַ֛ע <S%H4513><s%> is withholden מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> of your God מִנְחָ֥ה <S%H4503><s%> for the meat offering וָנָֽסֶךְ׃ <S%H5262><s%> and the drink offering

קַדְּשׁוּ־ <S%H6942><s%> Sanctify צוֹם֙ <S%H6685><s%> ye a fast קִרְא֣וּ <S%H7121><s%> call עֲצָרָ֔ה <S%H6116><s%> a solemn assembly אִסְפ֣וּ <S%H622><s%> gather זְקֵנִ֗ים <S%H2205><s%> the elders כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> [and] all the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> [into] the house יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְזַעֲק֖וּ <S%H2199><s%> and cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

אֲהָ֖הּ <S%H162><s%> Alas לַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for the day כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for קָרוֹב֙ <S%H7138><s%> [is] at hand י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for the day יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּכְשֹׁ֖ד <S%H7701><s%> and as a destruction מִשַׁדַּ֥י <S%H7706><s%> from the Almighty יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> shall it come

הֲל֛וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before עֵינֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5869><s%> before our eyes אֹ֣כֶל <S%H400><s%> Is not the meat נִכְרָ֑ת <S%H3772><s%> cut off מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> angels שִׂמְחָ֥ה <S%H8057><s%> [yea] joy וָגִֽיל׃ <S%H1524><s%> and gladness

עָבְשׁ֣וּ <S%H5685><s%> is rotten פְרֻד֗וֹת <S%H6507><s%> The seed תַּ֚חַת <S%H8478><s%> under מֶגְרְפֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4053><s%> under their clods נָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <S%H8074><s%> are laid desolate אֹֽצָר֔וֹת <S%H214><s%> the garners נֶהֶרְס֖וּ <S%H2040><s%> are broken down מַמְּגֻר֑וֹת <S%H4460><s%> the barns כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הֹבִ֖ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> is withered דָּגָֽן׃ <S%H1715><s%> for the corn

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How נֶּאֶנְחָ֣ה <S%H584><s%> groan בְהֵמָ֗ה <S%H929><s%> How do the beasts נָבֹ֙כוּ֙ <S%H943><s%> are perplexed עֶדְרֵ֣י <S%H5739><s%> the herds בָקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> of cattle כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> Because אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there מִרְעֶ֖ה <S%H4829><s%> because they have no pasture לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> them גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even עֶדְרֵ֥י <S%H5739><s%> yea the flocks הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> of sheep נֶאְשָֽׁמוּ׃ <S%H816><s%> are made desolate

אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> to thee will I cry כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For אֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> for the fire אָֽכְלָה֙ <S%H398><s%> hath devoured נְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> the pastures מִדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness וְלֶ֣הָבָ֔ה <S%H3852><s%> and the flame לִהֲטָ֖ה <S%H3857><s%> hath burned כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> all the trees הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the field

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even בַּהֲמ֥וֹת <S%H929><s%> The beasts שָׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field תַּעֲר֣וֹג <S%H6165><s%> cry אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> about כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יָֽבְשׁוּ֙ <S%H3001><s%> are dried up אֲפִ֣יקֵי <S%H650><s%> also unto thee for the rivers מָ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> of waters וְאֵ֕שׁ <S%H784><s%> and the fire אָכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> hath devoured נְא֥וֹת <S%H4999><s%> the pastures הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness פ
